definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to pull/to draw (a cart or a bow)/to roll up/to coil/to carry on the arm/to lament the dead/(fig.) to pull against/to recover

sentences.english: Because there’s no way to correct Google’s central failure.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲谷歌的中樞衰竭依然是無法挽救了。

sentences.english: Nothing short of a miracle can save him now.
sentences.chinese: 現在除非出現奇蹟，已經無法挽救他了。

sentences.english: The world of 2666 has been irretrievably shattered.
sentences.chinese: 《2666》的世界無法挽救地支離破碎。

sentences.english: A good social media marketing program cannot fix a broken business.
sentences.chinese: 一個好的社交媒體營銷是無法挽救一家破產企業的。

sentences.english: This incurable blackness takes possession of the interior of a man and is there converted into evil.
sentences.chinese: 這種無法挽救的黑色透入人心，便成爲惡。

sentences.english: However, we are too late to save the Worldstone.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，我們還是來得太遲，無法挽救世界之石。
